name: Personal QR Message
author: Codres

sections.description:
Personal QR message WP plugin.

This plugin allows the seller to create personalized messages for the buyer by a QR code technology.
The seller can generate text, audio, video messages and send them directly via email or generate a pdf file with a QR code and include it in the order.
Thanks to this solution, contact with the customer will become more personal and will allow your store to build a good reputation.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

Coming soon

How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.
